CustomField.description: This field is populated automatically via formula whenever one of the other "value" fields on this record is populated. It stores the collected values of all states which result in "true" for one of the following checkboxes on product state config: "LLC_BI__Is_Booked__c", "LLC_BI__Is_Closed__c", "LLC_BI__Is_Excluded_From_Stage_Duration__c", or "LLC_BI__Is_Ready_To_Transmit__c"
CustomField.formula: "#" & LLC_BI__Value_1__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_2__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_3__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_4__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_5__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_6__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_7__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_8__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_9__c & "#" & LLC_BI__Value_10__c & "#"
CustomField.label: All Values
